resources.refreshAccessToken: Refresh access token for the Admin API
resources.fetch&FilterListLayouts: Get and filter the list of layouts.
resources.programDescription: A tool to manage OCC's layouts and widget instances.
resources.operationType: Choose an operation from the list below
resources.removeInstance: Detach an instance from all layouts.
resources.replaceInstance: Replace an instance by another one.
resources.insertInstanceBefore: Insert an instance before another one.
resources.insertInstanceAfter: Insert an instance after another one.
resources.moveInstanceBefore: Move an instance before another one.
resources.moveInstanceAfter: Move an instance after another one.
resources.removeInstance.mainInstance: Select the desired instance to be detached
resources.replaceInstance.mainInstance: Select the desired instance to be inserted
resources.insertInstanceBefore.mainInstance: Select an instance to insert before
resources.insertInstanceAfter.mainInstance: Select an instance to insert after
resources.moveInstanceBefore.mainInstance: Select an instance to move before
resources.moveInstanceAfter.mainInstance: Select an instance to move after
resources.replaceInstance.refInstance: Select the desired instance to be detached
